word:
So far the work has been carried on under difficulties. The building has been furnished completely and well, and yet without extravagance. But it has never been supplied with proper treatment rooms, and it is impossible for the workers to do satisfactory work without better facilities in this respect. Good work has been done in the small treatment 
                                                                           21
rooms which were in the original building, but the nurses have had to contend with many difficulties.
